title: Agent Configuration
subtitle: Configure AI agents and MCP tools for task execution
browser_agent_desc: Browser Agent handles web automation tasks like navigation, clicking, form filling, and content extraction.
file_agent_desc: File Agent handles file system operations like reading, writing, searching, and organizing files.
custom_prompt_desc: Add custom instructions to extend the Agent's capabilities. This prompt will be appended to the agent's system prompt.
browser_prompt_placeholder: Example: When extracting data from tables, always format the output as JSON arrays and save to file...
file_prompt_placeholder: Example: When creating new files, always add a header comment with creation date and author information...
available_tools_desc: Enable or disable specific MCP (Model Context Protocol) tools that agents can use during task execution.
save_success: Configuration saved and agents reloaded successfully!
